mapper.insert: INSERT INTO camstudy_member ( camstudy_member_no, email, study_no, nickname, learning_time, learning_type, entrance_time, total_learning_time) VALUES ( seq_camstudy_member_no.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{studyNo}, #{nickname}, '00:00:00', '공부', SYSDATE, '00:00:00' )
mapper.select: SELECT email, nickname, learning_time, learning_type, TO_CHAR(entrance_time,'YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss') entrance_time, total_learning_time FROM camstudy_member WHERE study_no = #{studyNo} AND email = #{email}
SELECT email, nickname, learning_time, learning_type, TO_CHAR(entrance_time,'YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm:ss') entrance_time, total_learning_time FROM camstudy_member WHERE study_no = #{studyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE camstudy_member SET learning_time = ( SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (total / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (total, 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (total, 60), 'fm00') time FROM (SELECT ( (TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2)))+ (TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (#{learningTime}, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (#{learningTime}, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (#{learningTime}, 7, 2))) ) total FROM camstudy_member WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}) ) WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}

UPDATE camstudy_member SET learning_type = #{learningType}, total_learning_time = ( SELECT TO_CHAR (TRUNC (total / 3600), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (TRUNC (ABS (MOD (total, 3600)) / 60), 'fm00') || ':' || TO_CHAR (MOD (total, 60), 'fm00') time FROM (SELECT ( (TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (total_learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (total_learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (total_learning_time, 7, 2)))+ (TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 1, 2)) * 60 * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 4, 2)) * 60 + TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (learning_time, 7, 2))) ) total FROM camstudy_member WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}) ), learning_time = '00:00:00' WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE camstudy_member WHERE email = #{email} AND study_no = #{studyNo}
